summary: TL* TAKATA RECALL. THE CONTACT OWNS A 2010 TOYOTA 4RUNNER. THE CONTACT RECEIVED NOTIFICATION OF NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 16V340000 (AIR BAGS). THE PART TO DO THE REPAIR WAS UNAVAILABLE.  THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE MANUFACTURER EXCEEDED A REASONABLE AMOUNT OF TIME FOR THE RECALL REPAIR. THE CONTACT SPOKE WITH TWO DEALERS (STEVINSON TOYOTA EAST 444 S HAVANA ST, AURORA, CO 80012 AND STEVINSON TOYOTA WEST 780 DENVER WEST COLORADO MILLS BLVD, LAKEWOOD, CO 80401) WHO STATED THAT PARTS WERE NOT AVAILABLE AND WERE ON BACKORDER. THE MANUFACTURER WAS MADE AWARE OF THE ISSUE STATED THAT PARTS WERE NOT AVAILABLE. THE MANUFACTURER DID NOT KNOW WHEN PARTS WOULD BE AVAILABLE AND OFFERED A LOANER VEHICLE, WHICH THE CONTACT DECLINED. THE CONTACT HAD NOT EXPERIENCED A FAILURE. PARTS DISTRIBUTION DISCONNECT.
